name: ADANI GREEN ENERGY LIMITED
summary: ADANI GREEN ENERGY LIMITED is located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India and is part of the Electric Power Generation Industry. ADANI GREEN ENERGY LIMITED has 1,340 total employees across all of its locations and generates $433.64 million in sales (USD). There are 37 companies in the ADANI GREEN ENERGY LIMITED corporate family.
